1.18.1.0.1: Fix bug where If you use an infernal shard on a witch it crashes the game.  Fixed typo in lang file.  Fix guard not spawning in some cases using the Cursed Pillager Amulet
1.18.1.0.2: Iron Golems and Town Guards are at peace.  Upgraded Town Guard AI to match the same as the friendly Golem; guard will now fight back against Illagers, vindicators, raiders, etc.
